jobs.title: Awesome Content Writer for Agency working with US, EU startups (Remote) - India Team
jobs.description:
We are looking for awesome content writers for our India team. People who are happy, self-motivated and believe that they can accomplish amazing things in life.

Startup Voyager is a 100% remote top-notch content and SEO agency working with exciting startups in the US and Europe. 

**Our work has appeared in top publications like Inc, Entrepreneur, Fast Company, Harvard Business Review, Huffpost, Lifehacker (US Editions). **

We are a 12-member 100% remote team spread across 4 countries. 

Our clients love us because we have the ability to frequently outrank top sites on Google, including giants like Amazon, Forbes, Capterra, Microsoft, CNN, etc. 

Here's the good news!

Several of our clients are companies that offer software for remote working. This gives us a very positive growth outlook even in this economy - when everyone is working from home. Yay!

**Check out this video to learn about our growth plan, and how you could change your life by working with us. https://vimeo.com/396229709/797ddf0a9d**

If you join us, you will be trained in the same methodologies that enable us to consistently outrank top sites on Google. Most importantly, we achieve all this without technical SEO, backlinks or any other form of content promotion.

*(By the way, please read the entire JD carefully before applying!)*

Check out our site here:
https://startupvoyager.com/

**Open positions are for: **

1. Full-time employees or
2. Part-time employees who can dedicate a minimum of 40 hours a month
(So please don't apply if you are just looking for a freelancing gig alongside your full-time job.)

**Required Experience:**

* 1 - 4 years in a content writing role (approximately)
* You should have prior experience in writing blog articles.
* You should have written at least 20 blog posts in your entire career
* Writing for social media, website and landing page copy, etc. does NOT count.
* Experience should preferably be in writing B2B topics
* You get brownie points if you have experience in writing long form articles.
* No experience in SEO required.
* You don't need a college degree to apply. One of our major Californian clients' CEO is a dropout :)

**Scope of Work:**

Ghostwriting articles for our clients’ blogs. Most articles will be above 2500 words.

**Secondary Scope:**

You will also need to do SEO research and other content marketing activities. But no prior SEO experience is required (we will train you.)

**Essential Skills:**

1. Advanced or native-level proficiency in written English 
2. Excellent content writing skills in a number of different styles/tones
3. Strong research skills
4. Ability to learn new topics quickly
5. Impeccable spelling and grammar
6. Basic expertise in Google Docs

Additional Skills (that will give your application an edge:
Experience in SEO and other areas of marketing.

**Required Soft Skills**

Keep in mind that the standards here are the highest in the world. Therefore, even highly experienced writers find it rather challenging. That's why you should have the following soft skills:

1. A very strong desire to learn about SEO and content marketing.
2. Ability to adapt and learn new topics quickly
3. A strong interest in building a career in content marketing
4. A strong desire to win
5. Ability to work independently from a remote location
6. Ability to take initiative and take end-end responsibility for deliverables

Finally, we want folks who are happy and believe that they can truly change their lives! Yes, this matters!

**Career Benefits of the Role:**

1. Salary increments every 3 months (based on performance)
2. The opportunity to work closely with top marketing teams from the US and Europe.
3. Learn SEO and growth strategies being applied by the best content and SEO experts in the world.
4. Work with a highly motivated team with a powerful desire to win every single time.
5. Work in a team where your opinion and inputs matter - no matter how junior you are. We don't believe in hierarchies.
6. Ditch the daily commute and get the flexibility of a remote job. 

**Salary Range: **

INR 3.6 lakhs to 14 lakhs a year (full time) depending on your writing ability, experience and location. 
However, anything above INR 6 lakhs will only be offered to genuinely talented and experienced writers.

**Please do NOT apply if:**

1. You have no prior experience in blog article writing.
2. Your don't have advanced or native-level proficiency in written english 
3. You just want a freelancing gig. We are only offering jobs - full time or part time positions.
4. You want to work part time for us without quitting your full-time job.
5. Your current salary is more than the stipulated maximum amount in the JD (exception is if you already have experience in writing for B2B SaaS companies or US/UK audiences or you are willing to take a pay cut)
6. You have strong biases towards any particular group of people. We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate on the basis of religion, race, sexual orientation, etc.
7. You have trouble accepting any negative feedback about your work. (The first step in growing and learning is to identify what you aren't doing right and act on it.)
8. Your idea of a remote job is an easy laid-back job.

**If you are a full time freelancer**
Please apply only if you ALSO have 2+ years of work experience in a full-time job.
However, if you are a student who also freelances, you are eligible.

**To apply**
1. Please mention what sort of experience you have in writing blog articles. (in 3 sentences max.)
2. Specify your salary expectation

Cheers!
Peter
Co-Founder and CEO

jobs.title: Content Writer for Agency working with US, EU startups (Remote)
jobs.description:
We are looking for awesome content writers. People who are happy, self-motivated and believe that they can accomplish amazing things in life!

Startup Voyager is a 100% remote top-notch content and SEO agency working with companies in the US and Europe. 

**Our work has appeared in top publications like Inc, Entrepreneur, Fast Company, Harvard Business Review, Huffpost, Lifehacker (US Editions). **

We are a 12-member 100% remote team spread across 3 countries. 

Our clients love us because we have the ability to frequently outrank top sites on Google, including giants like Amazon, Forbes, Capterra, Microsoft, CNN, etc. 

Here's the good news!

Several of our clients are companies that offer software for remote working. This gives us a positive growth outlook even in this uncertain economy. Yay!

**Check out this video to learn about our growth plan, and how you could change your life by working with us. https://vimeo.com/396229709/797ddf0a9d**

If you join us, you will be trained in the same methodologies that enable us to consistently outrank top sites on Google. Most importantly, we achieve all this without technical SEO, backlinks or any other form of content promotion.

Check out our site here:
https://startupvoyager.com/

**Salary Range: **

US$24,000 - $40,000 a year (full time) depending on your writing ability, experience and location. 
(This job post and salary is only for candidates residing in US, Canada, Western Europe, Australia and New Zealand. If you are based elsewhere, please apply in the job posting for your applicable location.)

*(By the way, please read the entire JD before applying!)*

**We are looking for:**

Excellent blog writers, with a background in content marketing. (No experience in SEO required)

**Open positions are for: **

1. Full-time employees or
2. Part-time employees who can dedicate a minimum of 40 hours a month
(So please don't apply if you are just looking for a freelancing gig alongside your full-time job.)

**Scope of Work:**

1. Ghostwriting long-form articles for our clients’ blogs. Most articles will be above 2500 words.

2. You will be trained for a managerial position and expected to play a supervisory role within 3-6 months, which includes editing articles and managing other content writers.

**Secondary Scope:**

You will also need to do SEO research and other content marketing activities. But no prior experience is required (we will train you.)

**Required Experience:**

* 1 - 4 years in a content marketing role (approximately)
* You should have written at least 20 blog posts in your entire career
* Writing for social media, website and landing page copy, etc. does NOT count.
* You get brownie points if you have experience in writing long form articles.
* You get more brownie points if you have managerial experience.

**Essential Skills:**

1. Native-level fluency in written English
2. Excellent content writing skills in a number of different styles/tones
3. Strong research skills
4. Ability to learn new topics quickly
5. Impeccable spelling and grammar
6. Basic expertise in Google Docs or Microsoft Word

Additional Skills (that will give your application an edge:
Experience in SEO and other areas of marketing.

**Required Soft Skills**

Keep in mind that the standards here are the highest in the world. Therefore, even very experienced writers who join us find it rather challenging. That's why you should have the following soft skills:

1. Excellent interpersonal skills. The people being hired for our N. America, W. Europe, Aus., NZ team will be trained for a managerial position.
2. A very strong desire to learn about SEO and content marketing.
3. Ability to adapt and learn new topics quickly
4. A strong interest in building a career in content marketing
5. A strong desire to win

Finally, we want folks who are happy and believe that they can truly change their lives! Yes, this matters!

**Ability to Work Remotely**

1. Ability to work independently
2. Ability to take initiative and take end-end responsibility for deliverables
3. Ability to understand written instructions and feedback quickly
4. Ability to communicate clearly over Slack and video calls

**Time Zone:**

Several of our team members are based in India. You should be able to dedicate at least 2 hours a day anytime between 7am to 7pm India Time (GMT+5.30) for video calls and discussions over Slack.

**Career Benefits of the Role:**

1. Salary increments every 6 months (based on performance)
2. The opportunity to work closely with top marketing teams 
3. Learn SEO and growth strategies being applied by the best content and SEO experts in the world.
4. Work with a highly motivated team with a powerful desire to win every single time.
5. Fast-track to a managerial role without waiting for years!
6. Ditch the daily commute and get the flexibility of a remote job. 

**Please do NOT apply if:**

1. Your don't have native-level fluency in written English
2. You don't have any experience in writing articles
3. You just want a freelancing gig. We are only offering jobs - full time or part time positions.
4. You have strong biases against any particular group of people. We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate on the basis of religion, race, sexual orientation, etc.
5. You have trouble accepting any negative feedback about your work. (The first step in growing and learning is to identify what you aren't doing right and act on it.)
6. You are not serious about building a career in marketing.
7. You have no interest in playing a managerial role.

To learn more about us, check out startupvoyager.com
